title: Is it possible to immigrate Canada without IELTS score? - Quora

response.answer_text: As you are not willing to appear for IELTS. And still wanted to go and study in Canada, in that case there is a program called ESL. Tuition fee for ESL school, please check information below.6 months for ESL plus College Pathway ProgramCAD $6,480 ( Semi-Intensive Program - 20 hours per week ) After completing ESL course you can get direct admission in any college/university with out IELTS for Diploma / Undergraduate / Postgraduate program.

I migrated to Canada without IELTS. They gave me an exemption. Likewise, they exempted me from the personal interview. So in my experience, it is possible to immigrate without an IELTS score. I don’t know their basis or reasoning, as I only received letters of exemption each time without any explanation. (I applied under the federal program under professional/skilled category more than 15 years ago). At the time of my application, IELTS and interviews were mandatory part of the process. So I was glad to save myself of precious time.
